alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued February 28 at 11:34PM AKST until March 01 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow will cause whiteout conditions. The cold wind chills as low as 35 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely difficult.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
